name: A Dicey Quest
description:
Solution

Desktop version available below.

Everything have been made during the jam by me.

Music by Lukidanger (also made during the jam).

Story

The divine magic dice needs your help to destroy the Great Evil. Push it around to solve the puzzles on your way.

Controls :
  • Arrows/ZQSD/WASD to move around.
  • R to respawn
  • M to mute the music
Known issues
  • In the ice part, there is a spot where you can push the dice into a wall. The dice is supposed to fall and respawn here anyway, so just respawn manually (R).
